alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Las Animas County through 230 PM MDT... At 200 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Aguilar, or 12 miles north of Trinidad, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hoehne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
